original: The exhibition was divided into two distinct propositions: Proposition A and Proposition B. Each proposition featured a unique artwork from the same group of artists, showcasing a variety of mediums and approaches. Proposition A focused on more primitive themes and utilized archaic displays, while Proposition B marked a transition towards modernity and industrialization. This structure allowed each artist to present an alternative persp
